Plot: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to a pop singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.
Title: The Bodyguard
Actors: Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp, Bill Cobbs
tomatoConsensus: The Bodyguard is a cheesy, melodramatic potboiler with occasional moments of electricity from Whitney Houston.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 18 nominations.
